articles.author: CGTN
articles.title: Qatar retain Asian Cup title thanks to Afif's penalty hat-trick - CGTN
articles.description: Qatar successfully defended their Asian Cup crown after beating Jordan 3-1 on Saturday at Lusail Stadium where Akram Afif converted three penalties as the hosts won their second continental title.Playing in their first Asian Cup final, Jordan sought
articles.content:
Qatar successfully defended their Asian Cup crown after beating Jordan 3-1 on Saturday at Lusail Stadium where Akram Afif converted three penalties as the hosts won their second continental title.
